content: the bottom yo draw through 1st loop yo draw through all 3 loops the loops you insert your hook through will be at the bottom of the just completed set ldc long double_crochet yo insert hook into skipped stitch 3 row down 1 row down if doing final row encapsulating the previous row yo bring up the loop gently to the height of the working row don t scrunch the fabric complete the double_crochet as normal rsc reverse single_crochet this is a finishing decorative stitch that creates a rope look it is worked in the opposite direction of the stitches with the right side of the work facing you ch1 turning chain doesn t count yo insert hook through the stitch just completed of the previous row yo draw through the 2 loops on the hook repeat to end of row or round finish off pattern color a 76 fhdc or multiple of 4 2 round 1 chain 3 double_crochet double_crochet ch1 sk1 *double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet ch1 sk1 repeat from * to end of round sl to top of turning chain to join round 2 chain 3 double_crochet double_crochet ch1 sk1 *double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet ch1 sk1 repeat from * to end of round sl to top of turning chain to join fasten_off color b attach yarn to 3rd double_crochet of the group of 3 double_crochet either before or after the slip_stitch round 3 ch3 ldc into skip st 3 row down double_crochet ch1 sk1 *double_crochet ldc double_crochet ch1 sk1 repeat from * to end of round sl to top of turning chain to join round 4 ch3 double_crochet double_crochet ch1 sk1 *double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet ch1 sk1 repeat from * to end of row sl to top of turning chain to join the ch1 and skip stitches are over the previous row ch1 fasten_off color c or next color of your choice repeat rounds 3 and 4 until hat is to your desired size change colors after the row 4 the last row of your hat will be a slight variation of row 4 last round ch3 ldc into skip st 1 row down double_crochet double_crochet *double_crochet ldc double_crochet double_crochet repeat from * to end of round sl to top of turning chain to join finishing turn the hat inside out weave in all the tails if you haven t done that as you went lay the hat flat with the foundation row at the top attach the yarn to last stitch and slip_stitch to the 1st stitch to close that round you can also do this step earlier with the starting tail if you want to continue to sl stitch the front loop of the front side of the hat to the back loop of the back side of the hat when you get to the end of the hat finish off and turn the hat right side out brim use the same color as last row or change to 1st color attach yarn at the slip_stitch round 1 chain
